4645144.headline: Ares Capital Corp Estimates Basic And Diluted GAAP EPS As Of Dec 31, 2022 To Be In Range $0.29 To $0.38 And $0.29 To $0.37 Respectively
4645144.description: Jan 12 (Reuters) - Ares Capital Corp <ARCC.O>::ARES CAPITAL CORP - ESTIMATES THAT BASIC AND DILUTED GAAP EPS AS OF DEC 31, 2022 WILL BE IN RANGE OF $0.29 TO $0.38 AND $0.29 TO $0.37, RESPECTIVELY.ARES CAPITAL CORP SEES QTRLY CORE EPS AS OF DEC 31, 2022 WILL BE IN RANGE OF $0.61 TO $0.63.ARES CAPITAL CORP SEES NET ASSET VALUE PER SHARE AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2022 WILL BE IN RANGE OF $18.35 TO $18.43.Further company coverage: ARCC.O. ((reuters.briefs@thomsonreuters.com;)).
